cards.name: Sentinel
cards.description: Sentinel is a mythical pokemon clad in ornate armor, found in grassland environments. It has a peaceful nature and is often seen spending its day in solitude, enjoying the serenity of its surroundings. Despite its tranquil demeanor, it is not to be underestimated; its Giga Slam and Slash techniques are a force to be reckoned with. One must be careful when crossing paths with Sentinel, just as it takes care when it crosses paths with others.
cards.image_prompt: Sentinel::0 a mythical neutral-type pokemon::2.5, wearing ornate armor, in a grassland environment, bright lighting, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
